## toggl project list

List your projects

### Synopsis


Show a list of your projects. Displays one project per line.
	
Format used: "  <Name> (<ID>)"

toggl project list

```
toggl project list
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.toggl.yaml)
      --token string    Provide your API token
```
